summary: UPDATED! NEW VERSION 1.4. A long Dragonbone bridge stretching from Riverwood Path to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
NEW VERSION: 1.5.2 READ BELOW FOR MORE DETAILS

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD.

This is my first mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. A long Dragonbone bridge stretching from the Riverwood Path to Whiterun.
You 'll find the South entrance close to the waterfall at the edge of Riverwood. Leaving the village, turn left and cross a part of the hill.
The North entrance is located near Whiterun's Gates, on right.

I'm still looking for a translator about the book in breezehome!!!
For the moment, the entire mod is in French (Armor/Guards Names etc...).
I'will release an English version soon (I hope).


Current version: 1.5.2
Added:
- New Navmeshes
- Meshes & Texture LOD, The bridge is now Full LOD and can be visible from a long distance.
- A New model inside Whiterun (Actually, it's exactly the same than the bridge of the worldspace, so it is more realistic)
- Normal Maps for the armor texture
- A Model visible from the Skyrim Worldspace

Fixed:
- A little bug: Two pieces of the bridge were flying over The Giant's Camp (Thanks to Sushi258)

Soon in 1.6:
-More guards.
-A new entrance.
-A Bug Fix for the Quest

CHANGELOG:

V.1.4
Added:
-A New NPC: Warlock de Ghluck (Warlock of Ghluck), writer of the Storv√§gorm book, in his own house (at the south entrance of the bridge).
-A Map Marker for the bridge
-A New Quest: BUG: The quest doesn't start, it will be fixed soon.

V. 1.3
Added:
-A new Guard Faction
-A new armor (craftable)
-Some Navmeshes, allowing NPC's to walk on the bridge.
-A New model inside Whiterun. The Bridge is now visible from the Whiterun Market.

V. 1.2
Fixed:
- The Bridge Entrance Bug has been fixed (really).
author: Ozzydarkfmw
